sections.general: director of finance professional summary senior financial hospitality executive with over twenty years of managerial expertise, a proven and passionate leader in achieving goals. big picture focus on the essentials to a profitable operation: customer service excellence, cultivating employee loyalty, and financial accountability with the owners' interest as priority.
